DOC.criteria: Subjects understand sign informed consent form . Either sex Healthy subject , 18 65 year age Subjects skin type I IV accord Fitzpatrick Scale Subjects without erythema test area mid back skin ( visual irritation score = 0 ) baseline ( Day 1 ) , randomisation . Females pregnant , wish become pregnant study , breast feed Any topical systemic corticosteroid immunosuppressor within 3 week prior randomisation Any medication may interfere study result , particular topical drug apply test area within 2 week prior randomisation Any product may interfere study result , particular emollient , cream , gel , lotion body powder applied test area within 24 hour prior randomisation Any systemic cutaneous disease may confound interpretation study result ( e.g. , atopic dermatitis , eczema , psoriasis ) Scars , mole , sunburn , blemish test area may interfere grade Exposure excessive chronic UV radiation ( i.e. , sunbathe , solarium , phototherapy ) within 2 week prior randomisation plan study period Known suspect hypersensitivity component investigational product Participation interventional clinical trial within 4 week prior randomisation study period , base interview subject
